'''Heather Smith''' is a patient who was struck by lightning during the lightning storm.

==History==
Heather and her two kids were in their backyard during a lightning storm when they were all struck by lighting by way of their basketball hoop. They all went to the emergency room, where Heather had burns around her neck because the tin in her bronze necklace had melted, leaving the copper embedded in her skin. [[Benson Kwan]] debrided her injury.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is married to [[Mr. Smith]].

===Familial===
She and her husband have two children: Logan and Paige.
